subfields.name: fsType
subfields.label: Filesystem Type
subfields.helptext: The type of the filesystem, eg: 'ext4', 'xfs', 'ntfs'

subfields.name: driver
subfields.label: Driver
subfields.helptext: Driver is the name of the CSI driver that handles this volume. Consult with your admin for the correct name as registered in the cluster.

subfields.name: volumeAttributes
subfields.label: Volume Attributes
subfields.helptext: VolumeAttributes stores driver-specific properties that are passed to the CSI driver. Consult your driver's documentation for supported values.

subfields.name: nodePublishSecretRef
subfields.label: Node Publish Secret Reference
subfields.helptext: NodePublishSecretRef is a reference to the secret object containing sensitive information to pass to the CSI driver to complete the CSI NodePublishVolume                and NodeUnpublishVolume calls. This field is optional, and may be empty if no secret is required. If the secret object contains more than one secret, all secret references are passed.

subfields.name: name
subfields.label: Name of secret
subfields.helptext: The name of the kubernetes secret.

subfields.name: readOnly
subfields.label: Read Only
subfields.helptext: Enabling it will force the ReadOnly property in VolumeMounts.
